accent_status: Complete - includes udātta, anudātta, and svarita marks
encoding: BarahaSouth (converted to Devanagari with preserved accents)
completeness: Complete traditional corpus with full accent information

original_metadata.title: Complete Taittiriya Corpus
original_metadata.description: Complete digitized texts of Taittiriya Samhita, Brahmana, and Aranyaka

samhita.description: Mantra texts with padam (word-by-word) and samhita (continuous) versions

aranyaka.description: Forest texts with philosophical and mystical content

notes: 4,903 texts from VedaVMS (vedavms.in) in BarahaSouth format. FULL ACCENT COVERAGE including udātta (॑), anudātta (॒), and svarita marks. Includes regional variants (Āndhra/Drāviḍa) and pada format. This is a complete traditional corpus suitable for adhyayana (recitation learning). Source: VedaVMS Digital Manuscripts.
